sentences.sContent: His hands were badly scarred by the fire.
sentences.sCn: 他的双手被那次大火烧得疤痕累累。

sentences.sContent: She will probably be scarred for life .
sentences.sCn: 她有可能留下永久的疤痕。

remMethod.val: s + car(汽车) → 被汽车撞了一下， 留下伤痕 → 疤痕

words.tran: 在…上划痕；乱划；严厉批评

trans.tranCn: 给…留下疤痕；给…留下精神创伤；损害…的外观
trans.tranOther: if a wound or cut scars you, it leaves a permanent mark on your body
a permanent mark that is left on your skin after you have had a cut or wound
